title: The Art Institute of Chicago Announces Special Chance to See Van Gogh
copy: Wednesday, April 20, 2016   CHICAGO – Enjoy a one-of-a-kind experience of Van Gogh’s Bedrooms . Before the museum opens for the day, join our expert guides for an intimate tour of the Art Institute’s most popular special exhibition in 15 years. This limited-time offer is only available the final two weekends of Van Gogh’s Bedrooms , and tickets can be purchased at Letyourself.in .   Each tour can accommodate up to 25 guests and will begin promptly at 9:00 a.m. Tickets purchased for the exclusive offer will also provide admission to the Art Institute for the rest of the day. For those purchasing a member ticket, member cards will be checked upon arrival. Any guest arriving more than 15 minutes after the group has entered the galleries will not be permitted entry. Ticket holders are to enter at the Modern Wing (159 East Monroe Street).   Dates : Saturday, April 30 and May 7, Sunday, May 1 and 8   Time : 9:00 AM –10:00 AM   Tickets : $100 members, $125 nonmembers   Registration required : Letyourself.in
